trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Eastpointe
There were no other sightings in Eastpointe on or around July 8th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI live in Eastpointe Michigan and I went outside at 3:34am July 8th, 2012 and saw what i thought was a satellite as it didn't have any flashing lights and moving quicker than a plane. It was going in a straight line from south to north. But what caught my attention was it started off about as bright as a satellite, but then started getting brighter. It become the brightest thing in the sky next to the moon. But then as quick as it got bright it started getting dim again. Then it just disappeared in front of me.
